hero.core_tension: Choose concentrated early-window activations that win intent buyers without cutting December margin.
hero.setting: Retail storefront staged as a studio. Clean storefront glass, roster board on wall, staff line-up at counter.
hero.persona: Partnerships lead directing a co-branded in-store timed drop and Dec 7 late-afternoon watch-party (S1)
hero.action: Operator visibly choosing the collab-led path: handing a branded ticket to a store manager while pointing to a calendar block on Nov 256 Dec 09.
hero.urgency_symbol: Long shadow of a scoreboard-style game clock across the floor to imply Dec 7 timing and narrow window pressure.
props: Branded event tickets and a small printed staffing rota
A folded partnership one-pager labeled 'Timed Drop Dec 7'
A discreet QR code card placed near the counter to imply QR redemption tracking
hero.lighting: Polished editorial lighting with confident highlights on faces and calendar block. Clean negative space around the operator.
hero.alt: Partnerships lead finalizing a Dec 7 timed drop while handing event tickets to store manager

signal_map.structure: Concentric arcs representing the Nov 25 3 Dec 09 window with radial spokes for channel activations.
elements: Tokens for events plotted on arcs (co-branded drop, watch-party, pop-up)
Scaled rings labeled with footfall uplift bands (10-15%, 25%+)
A baseline node for CPA with a target band at 0.8x
signal_map.motion: Arrows flow from outer channels into a central measurement spine. Thicker paths denote higher conversion per dollar.
signal_map.palette: Neutral studio grays with confident accent tones: deep navy for partnerships, amber for in-store events, mint for measurement nodes.
signal_map.alt: Head of Retail mapping Nov 25 to Dec 09 activations with footfall uplift and CPA bands

case_studies.scene: Mid-size store on Dec 7 late afternoon. A clustered crowd around a branded counter as staff scan event QR cards.
case_studies.moment: The moment of conversion: a QR scan yields a timed offer that prompts immediate purchase and a visible uplift in foot traffic.
case_studies.persona: Store operations manager running the in-store watch-party and co-branded drop (references S1 and Late-Nov / early-Dec pocket)
props: QR redemption cards on a pedestal
case_studies.lighting: Warm editorial highlights on the counter. Soft fill light on the crowd. Clean negative space above the scene.
case_studies.alt: Store operations manager running a Dec 7 watch-party as QR scans trigger timed offers

case_studies.scene: Store-as-studio pop-up earlier in the Nov 253 Dec 09 window. A small staged demo with a content crew filming customer interactions.
case_studies.moment: Testing media-led buy-in: quick edit clips go live as part of a local paid boost. Staff log dwell time and conversion signals.
case_studies.persona: Head of Marketing testing a store-as-studio media activation to shift share into the early window (references Late-Nov / early-Dec pocket and store-as-studio approach)
props: Portable light panels and a compact camera on a tripod
A clipboard showing daily dwell time and conversion targets
case_studies.lighting: Crisp editorial key light on the demo subject. Soft backlight to separate subject from negative space.
case_studies.alt: Head of Marketing running a store-as-studio demo to measure dwell time and conversion
